Metadata: Self-Insurance Programs for the Commercial Fishing Industry
National Workshop on Fishing Vessel Insurance and Safety, Workshop Summary Report, February 4-6, 1987, Washington, D.C.
University of Alaska Sea Grant College Program

This booklet begins with an overview of the insurance business and descriptions of various ways to organize insurance groups. Then it describes some of the self-insurance groups now operated by fishermen and their organizations in the U.S. and some that are still in the organizational stage. This book is a good general guide to problems encountered by those who decide on self-insurance as an alternative to commercially available policies.
